Translations.Text: Em
Tarusi n Tezmamt s$uo Oebbi, Uzmir, Bab n uuwab
Ur Nexliq tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, siwa s tidep, ar lajel ipwassnen. Wid ijehlen numren ayen u$uo pwanedoen

Ini: "day ur twalam ara wigi u$uo la tepnujum, war Oebbi? Sseknet iyi d, d acu xelqen si tmurt, ne$ ma saan amur deg igenwan? Awit iyi d tazmamt id izwaren tagi, ne$ lateo n tmusni, ma tessawalem tidep
Anwa innetlafen sennig wid ipnujun, war Oebbi, $eo wayen ur asen d nepparra, ar ass n tnekra, u nitni stehzan deg unuju nnsen
Mara twafesrem imdanen, ad ilin d icenga nnsen, ad skiddben aabad nnsen
Ma $oan asen issekniyen nne£ iberrzen, wid iugin tidep, mi ten id tusa, ad inin: "wagi d sseur n uuee

Ne$ ad inin: "isnulfa t id". Ini: "lemmer it id snulfa$, ur tezmirem ad iyi tsellkem, s wacemma, si Oebbi. Neppa, Yif akw akken Issen, acu teekkum fellas. Iqadd Neppa d Anagi gari yidwen. Neppa, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ini: "ur lli$, ger imazanen, d win id isnulfuyen. Ur eoi$ acu ara ivoun yidi, ne$ yidwen. La iiafaoe$, kan, ayen iyi d ippuweeean. Aql i, kan, nek, d aneddao ipbegginen
Ini: "meyyzet ma, ayagi, s$uo Oebbi, u tnekoem t? Icehhed unagi n At Isoail, $ef lmetl is, d$a iumen. Tesme$wrem iman nnwen". Ih, Oebbi ur Inehhu agdud imednas
Nnan wid ijehlen, i wid iumnen: "lemmer d ayen ilhan, ur a$ zeggwiren $uoes". Imi ur pwanhan ara syis, qqaoen: "ayagi d tikerkas n zik
Uqbel is, Tazmamt n Musa, d nnhaya u d aeunu. Tagi d Tazmamt itebbiten, s wawalen n taaoabt, a ppendeo wid idensen, a ppessefoee lauuam
Ih, wid iqqaoen: "Mass nne$ d Oebbi, d$a ifen degs, ur ppagaden, ur $weblen
Widak d at Loennet, degs ad wekkoen, d arraz n wayen xeddmen

Nweuua amdan ar lewqama s imawlan is. Imma s temeen s tadist, temeen di tinnufra. Ger tadist akked ujumi, caret wagguren. Armi ibbwev d anqaqoi, issawev kueet isegwasen, inna: "a Mass iw! Eoo iyi a K snemmre$ af l$it i $ T$atev, nek akked lwaldin iw; ad xedme$ ayen ilhan ara K ioavin. Efk iyi d tarwa ilhan. Aql i utube$ K, aql i seg imvuaen
£uo wigi, Nqebbel lmefruz igiten nnsen, a Nessuref i tucmitin nnsen, ger at Loennet; d lemaahda n tidep, i sen ippuwaaaden

Win innan i imawlan is: "tfuh nnwen! Day yi taahdem a d kkre$? Ni$ aaddan isuta uqbel i". Nitni teppren tacvai n Oebbi: "a ssexv ik, amen! Ih, lmaahda n Oebbi, d tidep". A d yini: "ayagi, siwa tiekayin imezwura
D wigi i$ef iuao wawal iaanan leoyus n leonun akked yimdanen, i ten id izwaren. Ih, nitni d imexsuoen
I akw tiseddarin n wayen xedmen, iwakken ad yili warraz igiten nnsen. Nitni ur pwadensen

Ass ideg ara kecmen ar tmes, wid ijehlen: "tvegaam tieidanin i s tezham, di tmeddurt nnwen di ddunit. Assa, a ppeppuqeiiim s uaaqeb isdullun, imi tessem$waoem iman nnwen di tmurt, ur teklalem; imi tellam tbe$wlem
Mmekti d agmat n Aad, mi indeo agdud is deg igidan, u, s tidep, aaddan d ineddaoen zdat es, u zdeffir es: "siwa Oebbi ara taabdem. Nek ugade$, fellawen, aaaqeb n wass abarar
Nnan d: "day a$ d tusiv, ad a$ tfaoqev akked ioebbiten nne$? Awi a$ d ayen i$ef la $ tessagwadev, ma tessawalev tidep
Inna: "tamusni ar Oebbi kan. Ssawve$ awen ayen i$ef id ppuceggaa$. Maca, wala$ kwen d agdud ur nessin
Mi t walan d asigna id ileeeun ar t$wezza nnsen, nnan: "wagi d asigna ar a$ d iawin ageffur". Xaii! D ayen i$ef tearem, d avu, degs aaaqeb aqeoean
ad isqucc yal cci, s lameo n Mass is. Gwran d ur tepwaliv siwa ixxamen nnsen. Akka i Nepqeiii igduden ibe$wviyen

Ni$ Nessakrer asen ayen ur awen Nessakrer. Nefka yasen imeeeu$en, allen, akked wulawen. Ula i sen d bbwin deg wacemma imeeeu$en, allen, akked wulawen, mi skaddben issekniyen n Oebbi. Ayen i$ef ttihin, izzi d fellasen
Ni$ nessenger akw timdinin i wen d izzin, u Nenewwel asent issekniyen, amar a d u$alent s abrid
Acimi ur ten sellken ara wid rran d ioebbiten ieeaean, war Oebbi? Xaii! Ooan ten. D ayagi ay d tikerkas nnsen, u d wayen id snulfuyen
Mi k ed Nebbwi agraw n leonun, ad ssemeessen i Leqwoan; mi s eedoen, nnan: "eesset"! Mi ifukk, u$alen s agdud nnsen d ineddaoen
Nnan: "a yagdud nne$, aql a$ nesla i Tezmamt id irsen, deffir Musa, id itebbten ayen ip id izwaren, i inehhun ar tidep akked ubrid uwqim
A yagdud nne$, erret awal i uberrae n Oebbi, amnet yiS, ad awen Isemmee seg ibekkaven nnwen, a kwen Isellek seg uaaqeb aqeoean
Win isaaweegen i uberrae n Oebbi, ur ipsellik di tmurt, ur ippaf imawlan, war Neppa. Widak di ttelfan n uuee
Day ur walan ara ar Oebbi d Win Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, ur Ifcil seg uxlaq nnsen? Izmer a d Issider lmeggtin. Ih, Neppa Izmer i yal cci
Ass ideg ara d rsen, ar tmes, wid ijehlen: "macci s tidep ayagi"? A d inin: "ih, s Mass nne$"! A d Yini: "jeoobet aaaqeb $ef wayen la tnekoem
Eubeo akken ueboen wid ioeumen seg imazanen. I nitni, ur p$awal. Ass ideg ara walin acu i sen ippuwaaaden, amzun ur kminen siwa saaa n wass. D aberree: "anwa ara ipwakksen, siwa agdud icemten
Wid ijehlen, u ssefoa$en abrid n Oebbi, Itlef igiten nnsen
Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, umnen s wayen id irsen ar Mueemmed, u neppa d tidep s$uo Mass nnsen; Issemsa yasen tucmitin nnsen, Iueggem asen leala nnsen
Ayagi, acku wid ijehlen iiafaoen tikerkas; ma d wid iumnen, iiafaoen tidep n Mass nnsen. Akka id Ippak Oebbi imedyaten nnsen i imdanen

Mara d temlilem akked wid ijehlen, ewwtet ar tmegrav ar ten t$elbem. Arzet pen nezzeh. Sinna, d aserree ne$ d feddu, alamma isers ioad tiaekkwmin is. Akka, lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, yili I$leb iten, maca a kwen Ijeooeb, kra s kra. Wid ipwan$an deg ubrid n Oebbi, ur poueun igiten nnsen, d awez$i
A ten Inhu, ad Iueggem leala nnsen
A ten Issekcem di Loennet i sen Imla
A wid iumnen! Ma tefkam afus i Oebbi, ad awen Ifk afus, ad awen itebbet isurifen
Wid ijehlen, ay amxix nnsen, ad weddoen igiten nnsen
Ayagi, acku ugwin ayen id Issers Oebbi; ihi, Imea igiten nnsen
Aani ur nudan ara tamurt, ad walin amek tevoa d imezwura nnsen? Issexv iten Oebbi. Am akka i ijehliyen
Ayagi, acku Oebbi d bab n wid iumnen. Ijehliyen, ur asen illi bab
Ih, Oebbi ad Issekcem wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, di leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen. Wid ijehlen zehhun, teppen akken itepp lmal. D times ay d leqoao nnsen
Aceal n at temdinin i yifen, di tezmert, tamdint i k id ieaan! Nesqucc iten, ur asen illi useiiao
Day win illan ar ubeggen n Mass is, am win, iwumi ppucebbeen yir igiten is, u iiiafaoen chawi nnsen

Amek tga Loennet i ippuwaaaden i wid ipeezziben: degs isaffen n waman ur nxeppeo, isaffen n yi$i ur tfessed lbenna s, isaffen n ccoab aeidan i wid itessen, isaffen n tament ippuneqqan. Degs, i nitni, yal ppemoa, akked ssmae n Mass nnsen. Day am wid iwekkoen di tmes; sswan ten s waman ippayzagen, ara icergen afwad nnsen
Llan garasen wid i k issemeasen. Sifat ff$en d s$uoek, ad inin i wid iwumi teppunefk tmusni: "d acu id inna kan, llinna"? Wigi d wid iwumi Isle$ Oebbi ulawen, teddun kan d chawi nnsen
Wid ipwanhan, Irna asen nnhaya, Ifka yasen aeezzeb nnsen
Day la poaoun kan imir, a ten id ias, deqzalla? Ni$ usant ed licaoat is. Ma iusa d $uosen, iwumi t usmekti nnsen
Cfu ar, s tidep, ur illi oebbi siwa Oebbi; ssuter ssmae ubekkav ik, akked wid n lmumnin, argaz tameiiut. Oebbi Ieoa anda teebkem, akked wanda tberrkem
La qqaoen wid iumnen: "a lemmer a d ters tsuoep"! Maca, mi d ters tsuoep tuekimt, ideg id ipwader umennu$, a pwaliv at wul iblan, la k id pmuqulen s tii n win tessexcawat tmeppant. Yif it i nitni
wannuz, akked wawal uwqim. Mi ipwagzem ooay, ma ssawlen tidep ar Oebbi yif it i nitni
Day macci, ma twexxoem, ahat a ppesfesdem tamurt, a pfaoqem alag nnwen
Wigi d wid i Ixza Oebbi; Isgugem iten, Isder$el ieoi nnsen
Day ur pmeyyizen ara Leqwoan, ne$ u$alent tsergal $ef wulawen
Ih, wid ixedaan, deffir ubeggen n nnhaya $uosen, ikellex iten Cciian. Iooa ten tallit
Ayagi, acku nitni nnan i wid iugin ayen d Issader Oebbi: "ad awen na$ awal di kra n lumuo". Oebbi Ieoa lesrar nnsen
Amek ihi, ma ddment lmalayek leowae nnsen, la ten kkatent ar udmawen nnsen, iarar nnsen
Akka, ihi, ddan akked wayen isserfayen Oebbi. Ugin llza S. D$a Isseoxes igiten nnsen
Ne$ $ilen at wul amehzul, ard awez$i, ur d Issuffu$ ara Oebbi leb$wev nnsen
Lemmer i £ ihwi, ad ak ten id Nessken, war ccekk, a ten taaqlev ar udem nnsen, a ten taaqlev ar uuenf umeslay. Oebbi Issen igiten nnwen
S tidep, a kwen Njeooeb, alamma Nessen imjuhad, akked iueboiyen, segwen. A Njeooeb isallen nnwen
Ih, wid ijehlen, issefoa$en abrid n Oebbi, i inuqmen Amazan, deffir ubeggen n nnhaya $uosen, ur vuooen Oebbi s wacemma. Ad Isseoxes igiten nnsen
A wid iumnen! A$et awal i Oebbi, a$et awal i Umazan, ur ssioxiset igiten nnwen
Ih, wid ijehlen, issefoa$en abrid n Oebbi, sinna, mmuten d ijehliyen, war ccekk, ur sen Ipsemmie Oebbi, d awez$i
Ur ppiohifet, ur ssuturet tifrat, mara tilim d ine$laben! U Oebbi yidwen, ur kwen Ipeewwio, d awez$i, seg igiten nnwen
Tameddurt di ddunit, d urar kan, akked lhawiyya. Ma tumnem u teezbem, ad awen d Ifk arrazen nnwen. Ur awen issutur ayla nnwen
Ma Issuter awen t, a kwen Icebbwel, a pcueeem, a d iffe$ leb$wev nnwen

D kunwi i ipwanecden a pseddqem deg ubrid n Oebbi. Llan degwen wid ipcueeun. Win ipcueeun, ipcueeu kan $ef yiman is. Oebbi d Asaay, kunwi d igellilen. Ma twexxoem, a kwen Ineuuef s ugdud ur nelli segwen. D$a ur ppemcabin $uowen
Ih, Nefya yak l$elb iberrzen
iwakken ad Isemmee Oebbi ibekkaven ik id izwaren akked wid igwran. Ad ak Itim l$it iS, a k Iawi d ubrid uwqim
A k Iall Oebbi tallalt tuzmirt
D Neppa id Issersen talwit deg ulawen n lmumnin, iwakken ad yim$uo liman nnsen. N Oebbi Iasekoiwen n tmurt akked igenwan. Oebbi Izga Ieeeo, d Bab n uuwab
Iwakken ad Issekcem wid akked tid iumnen, ar leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad wekkoen. Ad asen Issemsu tucmitin nnsen. D wagi, ar Oebbi, ay d rrbee abarar
Ad Iaaqeb ixabiten, tixabitin, imcurak, timcurak, wid id ipfekkioen Oebbi yir afekkeo. Izzi yasen ddens. Irfa Oebbi fellasen, Ixza ten. Ihegga yasen d Loahennama. A tu$alin tucmip
N Oebbi iasekoiwen n tmurt akked igenwan. Oebbi Izga d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Ih, Nuzen ik id d anagi, d abcir, d aneddao
iwakken a ppamnem s Oebbi akked Umazan iS, a T kfum, ad aS tanzem, a T tesbuccuaem tauebeit, tameddit
Wid iaaqden yidek aaqden kan d Oebbi. Afus n Oebbi nnig ufus nnsen. Win ieenten, d imanis kan i isseenet. Win iiifen deg wayen i$ef iauhed Oebbi, ad as Ifk arraz abarar

Ad ak inin wid igwran, seg uaoaben n uclue: "i $ ice$wlen, d ayla nne$ akked twaculin nne$. Ssuter a neppusemmee". Qqaoen s yilsawen nnsen, ayen ur nelli deg ulawen nnsen. Ini: "anwa ara kwen iselken si Oebbi, s wacemma, ma Ib$a yawen vveoo, ne$ ma Ib$a yawen aba$uo? Xaii, Izga Oebbi Ippuxebbeo af wayen txeddmem
Xaii, t$ilem Amazan akked lmumnin ur d ppu$alen ara, d awez$i, ar twaculin nnsen. Ayagi, issefoee ulawen nnwen. Nnwaya nnwen dir ip. Kunwi d agdud imsenger
Wid ur numin s Oebbi, akked Umazan iS, ihi, aql a£ Nhegga d ajajie i ijehliyen
N Oebbi, tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Ipsemmie i win i S ihwan, Ipauqub win i S ihwan. Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu

A d inin wid igwran: "ma toueem a d t$eltem, ooet a$ a neddu yidwen". B$an ad bedlen awalen n Oebbi. Ini: "ur teppeddum yidne$, d awez$i. Akka ay d izwar wawal n Oebbi". A d inin: "teesedm a$"! Xaii, cwii kan ay fehhmen

Ini i wid igwran, seg uaoaben n uclue: "a ppepwanecdem s agdud amaawaou, uqsie; a t tenna$em, ne$ ad anzen. Ma tu$em awal, ad awen Ifk Oebbi arraz igerzen. Ma twexxoem, akken twexxoem uqbel, a kwen Iaaqeb s lqeoe
Ur telli tiyta deg uder$al, ne$ deg urejdal, ne$ deg umuvin. Win iunzen i Oebbi akked Umazan iS, a t Issekcem di leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen. Win iwexxoen, a t Iaaqeb s lqeoe
Ni$ Iouva Oebbi lmumnin, mi aaqden yidek, seddaw ttejoa. Ieoa i illan deg ulawen nnsen, Issers d fellasen talwit, I$na ten s l$elb aqoib
akked waias n lerbae, ara iifen. Oebbi Izga d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Iwaaaed awen Oebbi a d teiifem lerbae aias. I$awel awen d deg waya. Ikkes fellawen afus n medden. Akken ad yili ussekni i lmumnin, a kwen iawi d ubrid uwqim
Tayev, iwumi ur tezmirem, ihi, Izzi as Oebbi. Oebbi Izga Izmer i yal cci
Lemmer i kwen nnu$en wid ijehlen, ad rewlen, sinna, ur ppafen bab, ne$ asettao
D tannumi n Oebbi i illan si zik. Ur teppafev abeddel, d awez$i, di tannumi n Oebbi
D Neppa i Ikksen afus nnsen segwen, akked ufus nnwen segsen, di te$zut n Mekka, siwev Iss$elb ikwen fellasen. Oebbi Izga Ipwali ayen txeddmem

D nitni i ijehlen. Swexxoen kwen si Loamaa n Leaoam, ugin ad iawev usfel s amkan is. Lemmer macci d lmumnin, argaz tameiiut, ur ten tessinem, a ten teazem ur teeoim; segsen a d tegwrim di le$ouo - ni$ Oebbi Issekcam s aeunu S, win i S ihwan - lemmer mfaoaqen, yili, war ccekk, Nesaadda, $ef wid segsen ijehlen, aaaqeb aqeoean
Mi rran wid ijehlen, aeernun deg ulawen nnsen, aeernun n war tussna, Issers ed Oebbi talwit iS af Umazan iS, akked lmumnin. Iqqen asen awal ueezzeb. Iwata ten, klalen t. Oebbi Izga Ieoa yal cci

Ni$ Issawev Oebbi, i Umazan iS, tamu$li s tidep: war ccekk, a pkecmem Loamaa n Leaoam, ma Irad Oebbi, di laman, iqweooa nnwen uueilen u qeocen, ur teppagwadem. Ieoa ayen ur teeoim. Ihegga yawen d, ugwar aya, l$elb aqoib
Neppa id Iuznen Amazan iS s nnhaya, akked ddin n tidep, iwakken a t Issifrer $ef ddin meooa. Iqadd Oebbi d Anagi

Mueemmed d Amazan n Oebbi. Wid illan yides, qeseen ar ijehliyen, eninit garasen. A ten twaliv iiinizen, kennun, ssuturen lfevl s$uo Oebbi akked llza. Ccama nnsen, deg udmawen nnsen, d lateo n lekni. Ata wayen i ten icban di Tuoa akked wayen i ten icban di Linoil: am uaaqqa, iger ed im$i s, isoehd it. Ad iuzur, ad iaaooeo $ef yile$ is. Ippaaoab ifellaeen; i$webben yissen ijehliyen. Iwaaaed Oebbi ssmae akked warraz abarar, i wid degsen iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan
A wid iumnen! Ur zeggwiret zdat Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Eezzbet i Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
A wid iumnen! Ur zzuhriyet tu$ac nnwen, sennig ta$wect n Nnbi. Ur zaaavet $uoes, akken tepzaaavam garawen, mulac ad meun igiten nnwen, kunwi ur tfaqem
Ih, wid issrusun uut n ta$wect nnsen, ar Umazan n Oebbi, d wid iwumi Issefsi Oebbi ulawen nnsen, ar ueezzeb. Ad asen ippunefk ssmae akked warraz abarar
Ih, tegwti n wid ik n issawlen, deffir texxamin, ur pmeyyizen
Lemmer ubioen ard teff$ev $uosen, ppif i nitni. Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
A wid iumnen! Aballa$ ma ibbwi yawen d asali, ppueeqqeqet, mulac a pvuooem agdud, war tamusni, a ppu$alem tnedmem deg wayen txedmem

Cfut illa garawen Umazan n Oebbi. Ma issemees awen deg waias n lumuo, a pjafem. Maca, Oebbi Issaazez awen liman, Imellee it deg ulawen nnwen, Isseoeeg awen tijehli, dd$el, lmaauegga. Widak d wid ipwanhan
D lfevl s$uo Oebbi, d l$it. Oebbi Ieoa, d Bab n uuwab

Ma nnu$ent snat n iayfat n lmumnin, euddet pent. Ma tebw$ev yiwet degsent, $ef tayev, nna$et tin ibwe$ven alamma tevfeo lameo n Oebbi. Ma tevfeo it, ssemualeet pent, s lmizan. Wezznet. Oebbi Ieemmel wid iwezznen
Lmumnin d atmaten kan i illan. Ssemualeet atmaten nnwen, eezzbet i Oebbi, amar fellawen aeunu

A wid iumnen! £uowat ad imaalek ugdud $ef wayev, ahat d widen i ten yifen. Ne$ tilawin $ef tiyav, ahat d tiden i tent yifen. Ur pqeooidet iman nnwen, ur pmirgamet s tselleqwbin. Dir it isem n dd$el, anda illa liman. Wid ur nutub ara, d widak ay d imednas

A wid iumnen! Janbet aias n nnwaya. Ih, nnwaya, tikwal, d abekkav. Ur ppemaassat ara. Ur kkatet wa deg wa. Day ib$u yiwen, degwen, ad icc aksum n gmas lmegget? A t tagwim. Eezzbet i Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi Issuruf, Ipeunu
A yimdanen! Ni$ Nxelq ikwen si ddker akked nnta. Nerra kwen d igduden, d laaoac, a ppemyussanem. Ihi, ukyis nnwen amxallef, ar Oebbi, d win degwen ipeezziben sennig wiyav. Ih, Oebbi Ieoa, Ippuxebbeo

Nnan uaoaben n uclue: "numen". Ini: "ur tuminem". Maca init ed: "nunez"; ur ikcim ara liman ar wulawen nnwen. Ma touvam Oebbi akked Umazan iS, ur awen Isoueu acemma seg igiten nnwen. Oebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Lmumnin d wid kan iumnen s Oebbi akked Umazan iS, d$a, ur pcukun. Pna$en s wayla nnsen akked yiman nnsen, deg ubrid n Oebbi. D widak ay d imawlan n tidep
Ini: "day ad aS temlem i Oebbi, ddin nnwen"? Oebbi Ieoa i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Oebbi Issen yal cci
Rran ak annuz nnsen, d tajmilt. Ini: "ur iyi telli tejmilt deg annuz nnwen. Xaii, d Oebbi ikwen I$aten mi kwen Inha ar liman, ma d imawlan n tidep ay tellam
Ih, Oebbi Issen tabavnit n tmurt akked igenwan. Oebbi Ipwali ayen txeddmem
S Leqwoan, mucaa
Xaii! Wehmen mi ten id iusa uneddao, segsen. Nnan ijehliyen: "ayagi d lwehma
Ma nemmut, nu$al d akal, ayagi d tu$alin si mbaid
Ni$ Neeoa aceal, segsen, i issenqes wakal. £uone£ Tazmamt ieerrzen
Xaii! Nekoen tidep, mi ten id tusa, d$a terwi leala nnsen
Day ur muqlen ara igenni, sennig sen, amek i t Nebna? Ncebbee it, ur isai i$isan
Tamurt, Nvelq ip, Nerra degs idurar, Nessem$i d degs tayuga n yal uuenf amxallef
i tmu$li akked usmekti n yal amdan isteooiaen
Nesse$li d seg igenni aman ioqan. Nessem$i d yissen leonanat akked uaqqa n tmegra
akked tezdayin ti$wezfanin, s ijeooigen mbabben
d ooeeq i imdanen. Nessider d yissen tamurt immuten. Akka tanekra
Inkeo, uqbel nnsen, ugdud n Nue, At Rrass, Tamud
Aad, Feraun, atmaten n Lui
At Laika, akked ugdud n Tubbaa. Nekoen akw imazanen. Iuao ussigwed iW
Day £ issefcel uxlaq amezwaru? Wanag nitni di ccekk $ef uxlaq amaynut
Ni$ Nxelq ed amdan. Neeoa s wacu i t t$ewwu, teowiet is. Neqoeb $uoes, sennig ieuoan n temgaot is
Mara iifen wid ippaiiafen; qqimen, wa $eo yeffus, wa $eo zelmev
ur d iqqao awal, siwa ma illa $uoes, uassas imeelles
Iusa d ddux n tmeppant, ibbwi d tidep: "atan wayen iseg la treggwlev
Auuvu di lbuq. D wagi ay d ass n ussigwed
